title: I was trapped in a Croatian crypto festival while the market crashed
content:
The pilot must have seen a crash coming. The BlockDown Web3 conference was kicking off the next day. TNW was flying in to attend — but the fates had other plans. After descending towards the landing strip in Split, Croatia, the plane suddenly reversed course and climbed back into the skies. A shroud of Saharan sand had made it too dangerous to land — and the real drama had only just begun. When we finally arrived in Croatia the next day, the crypto market had entered its biggest downturn in years. Falling skies The seeds of the crash were sown…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: What better way to experience a historic crypto crash than at a blockchain conference?
